sense.name: member of a family of ductile chemical substances, either element or alloy
sense.examples: He trades in precious metals such as gold and platinum. Brass is an alloy mostly composed of the metals copper and zinc. Lithium and sodium are examples of alkali metals. The mechanic inspected the plane's wings for signs of metal fatigue. It's a sheet metal manufacturer. Bob's cousin has a metal plate in his skull.

sense.name: molten glass not yet blown or poured
sense.examples: The glassblower removed the metal carefully from the oven on a long-handled tool. The metal in a glassblowing shop is hot enough to sear you with third degree burns.

sense.name: broken up rocks used for roads
sense.examples: The laborers carried the road metal in wheelbarrows. These trucks carrying metal are going to repair a village road.

sense.name: a style of rock music
sense.examples: Pete listens mostly to heavy metal. We heard some metal bands at a club in Berlin. Mary is definitely not into metal, she likes folk music.
